description: This source file implements platform-dependent and general utility functions for the String Component Object related to Byte Array objects, specifically providing a function to create a new Byte Array component object in the RDK Management platform.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateByteArrayComponent(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Byte Array object container handle, using the internal factory function AnscByteArrayCOCreate.
